row.name: Cancer Risk
row.description: News about research on factors that affect cancer risk, including inherited genetic mutations, smoking/tobacco use, obesity, and infectious agents like HPV.

row.name: Childhood Cancer
row.description: News about childhood cancer research, with context from leading experts. Topics include new treatments, issues facing childhood cancer survivors, and findings on the biology of cancer in children.

row.name: Survivorship and Supportive Care
row.description: News on research that affect cancer patients and survivors. Topics include managing treatment side effects, fertility preservation, and cancer’s long-term effects.

row.name: FDA Drug Approvals
row.description: News on recent approvals of cancer therapies by the Food and Drug Administration. Includes expert comments on how the approval will influence patient care and future research.

row.name: Prognosis
row.description: Reports on cancer prognosis-related research, including articles on doctor–patient communication and approaches to determine patient prognosis more accurately, among others.

row.name: Clinical Trial Results
row.description: Reports on findings from cancer clinical trials, with commentary from leading researchers on how the trial results will affect patient care.

row.name: Treatment
row.description: Cancer treatment related news, with context from leading experts. Includes articles on new therapies, treatment side effects, and important trends in treatment-related research.

row.name: Global Health
row.description: News and expert commentaries about the impact of cancer around the world and efforts to improve global health, including new initiatives and research findings.

row.name: Disparities
row.description: News and commentaries about cancer-related racial/ethnic and socioeconomic disparities. Includes stories on factors that influence disparities and efforts to address them.

row.name: Screening and Early Detection
row.description: News about research on cancer screening and early detection. Includes stories on the impact of screening, new technologies, and approaches to improving the safety and efficacy of screening.

row.name: Technology
row.description: News and commentaries on technology used to conduct cancer research, deliver cancer treatment, improve patient care, and screen for cancer, as well as other topics.

row.name: Leadership and Expert Views
row.description: Commentaries from scientific leaders at NCI and other institutions about cancer research topics, programs, and initiatives.

row.name: Biology of Cancer
row.description: Cancer biology research news, with context from experts at NCI and elsewhere. Topics include cancer metastasis, the tumor microenvironment, and new targets for cancer therapies.

row.name: Prevention
row.description: Cancer prevention news, with comments from leading scientists. Topics include preventive interventions for those at increased risk of cancer, protective behaviors, and more.
